src/bessel/bessel01.f

00001 ! Bessel J_0(x),J_1(x),Y_0(x),Y_1(x),
00002 !        I_0(x),I_1(x),K_0(x),K_1(x) functions 
00003 !        in multiple precision
00004 !
00005 ! usage1
00006 !     call bessel01(x,1,eps,j_0,j_1,y_0,y_1)
00007 ! usage2
00008 !     call bessel01(x,-1,eps,i_0,i_1,k_0,k_1)
00009 ! input parameters
00010 !     x   : argument (x > 0)
00011 !     eps : error requested
00012 !
00013       program test_bes
00014         integer, parameter :: dbl = selected_real_kind(p=17)
00015         real(kind=dbl) :: x, eps, i0, i1, k0, k1
00016 
00017         x = 720.0
00018         eps = 1d-1
00019         i0  = 0d0
00020         i1  = 0d0
00021         k0  = 0d0
00022         k1  = 0d0
00023 
00024         call bessel01 ( x, -1, eps, i0, i1, k0, k1 )
00025 
00026         write(*,*) x, eps, i0, i1, k0, k1, dbl
00027 
00028       end program test_bes
00029 
00030       subroutine bessel01(x, l, eps, s, t, u, v)
00031       implicit real*8 (a - h, o - z)
00032       pi = 4 * atan(1.0d0)
00033       euler = 0.577215664901532860606512090082402431042159335939
00034      &    9235988057672348848677267776646709369470632917467495d0
00035       prc = -log(eps)
00036       if (x .lt. prc * 0.6d0) then
00037           s = eps
00038           t = 0
00039           u = 0
00040           v = 0
00041           w = 2 / x
00042           y = 0
00043           z = euler - log(w)
00044           if (x .gt. eps) then
00045               k = int(prc / 15 + ((2 + l) / 6.0d0) * x + 
00046      &            ((prc * prc / 7) * x) ** (1.0d0 / 3))
00047           else
00048               k = 1
00049           end if
00050           if (l .gt. 0) then
00051               do n = 2 * k, 2, -2
00052                   y = s + y
00053                   u = s / n - u
00054                   v = t * (n + 1) / (n * (n + 2)) - v
00055                   t = s * n * w - t
00056                   s = t * (n - 1) * w - s
00057               end do
00058               y = 1 / (2 * y + s)
00059               s = s * y
00060               t = t * y
00061               u = (4 * y * u + s * z) * (2 / pi)
00062               v = (4 * y * v + t * z - s * w / 2 - t) * (2 / pi)
00063           else
00064               do n = 2 * k, 2, -2
00065                   y = s + y
00066                   u = s / n + u
00067                   t = s * n * w + t
00068                   s = t * (n - 1) * w + s
00069               end do
00070               y = cosh(x) / (2 * y + s)
00071               s = s * y
00072               t = t * y
00073               if (x .lt. 1.5d0) then
00074                   u = 4 * y * u - s * z
00075               else
00076                   v = -x / 2
00077                   w = v
00078                   u = exp(-x) / 2
00079                   h = 9.0d0 / (prc + x)
00080                   y = exp(-h)
00081                   k = int(log(2 + 2 * prc / x) / h)
00082                   do n = 1, k
00083                       v = v / y
00084                       w = w * y
00085                       u = u + exp(v + w)
00086                   end do
00087                   u = u * h
00088               end if
00089               v = (1 / x - t * u) / s
00090           end if
00091       else
00092           w = 1 / (4 * x)
00093           k = int(prc * 0.12d0)
00094           do m = -1, 3, 4
00095               v = sqrt(8 / pi * w)
00096               y = v
00097               z = 0
00098               do n = 2, 8 * k + 6, 4
00099                   v = v * (w * (m * 1.0d0 / n - n + 2))
00100                   z = v - z * l
00101                   v = v * (w * (m * 1.0d0 / (n + 2) - n))
00102                   y = v - y * l
00103               end do
00104               if (m .eq. -1) then
00105                   t = y
00106                   u = z
00107               end if
00108           end do
00109           if (l .gt. 0) then
00110               v = sin(x - pi / 4)
00111               w = cos(x - pi / 4)
00112               s = v * u + w * t
00113               u = v * t - w * u
00114               t = v * y - w * z
00115               v = -v * z - w * y
00116           else
00117               v = exp(x) / 2
00118               w = pi / (4 * v)
00119               s = v * (t - u)
00120               u = w * (t + u)
00121               t = v * (y - z)
00122               v = w * (y + z)
00123           end if
00124       end if
00125       end
00126 !
